alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Cook (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:00PM EDT until August 08 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR COOK...CENTRAL BERRIEN AND LANIER COUNTIES... At 659 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ambrose to 9 miles west of Hahira, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Lakeland, Adel, Sparks, Ray City, Lenox, Meigs, Cecil, Courthouse, Cottle, Cook Co A/P, Berrien Co A/P, New Lois, Massee, Barneyville, Greggs, Pine Valley, Wagon Wheel, Hansell and Bannockburn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
